name: collab-sem2-project
description: Description: Be-my-pet is a pet adoption app for the users planning on adopting shelter dogs, cats and other pet animals. Be-my-pet provides a list of shelter pets looking for adoption from nearby shelter homes. People can post about their pets for finding them new home and a parent can simply chat with the person who posted about their pets Functionality:  •	User can post picture and description about their pets to list them for adoption •	User can edit the post •	Other user can move further with the chat option with the previous owner •	Email functionality will be used to confirm with final adoption details  •	User can sort the list for more recent listed pets
